channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-38485|2024-08-04T01:44:22.923Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to improper input validation in the restore file. This enables an attacker to provide malicious config files to replace any file on disk.
